Interface ISerializationProvider


  • public interface ISerializationProvider
    Interface of Serialization Provider

      java.lang.String serializeTransaction(java.lang.String json)

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(AbiEosSerializationObject deserilizationObject)
          throws DeserializeError
        Perform a deserialization process to convert a hex string to a JSON string given the parameters provided in the input deserilizationObject. The result will be placed in the json field of the deserilizationObject and can be accessed with getJson().
        Parameters:
        deserilizationObject - Input object passing the hex string to be converted as well as other parameters to control the deserialization process.
        Throws:
        DeserializeError - A deserialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.

      • serialize

        void serialize(AbiEosSerializationObject serializationObject)
        throws SerializeError
        Perform a serialization process to convert a JSON string to a HEX string given the parameters provided in the input serializationObject. The result will be placed in the hex field of the serializationObject and can be accessed with getHex().
        Parameters:
        serializationObject - Input object passing the JSON string to be converted as well as other parameters to control the serialization process.
        Throws:
        SerializeError - A serialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.

      • deserializeTransaction

        java.lang.String deserializeTransaction(java.lang.String hex)
                                 throws DeserializeTransactionError
        Convenience method to transform a transaction hex string to a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        hex - Hex string representing the transaction to deserialize.
        Returns:
        Deserialized JSON string representing the transaction hex.
        Throws:
        DeserializeTransactionError - A deserialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.

      • serializeTransaction

        java.lang.String serializeTransaction(java.lang.String json)
                               throws SerializeTransactionError
        Convenience method to transform a transaction JSON string to a hex string.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON string representing the transaction to serialize.
        Returns:
        Serialized hex string representing the transaction JSON.
        Throws:
        SerializeTransactionError - A serialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.

      • deserializeAbi

        java.lang.String deserializeAbi(java.lang.String hex)
                         throws DeserializeAbiError
        Convenience method to transform an ABI hex string to a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        hex - Hex string representing the ABI to deserialize.
        Returns:
        Deserialized JSON string representing the ABI hex.
        Throws:
        DeserializeAbiError - A deserialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.

      • serializeAbi

        java.lang.String serializeAbi(java.lang.String json)
                       throws SerializeAbiError
        Convenience method to transform an ABI JSON string to a hex string.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON string representing the ABI to serialize.
        Returns:
        Serialized hex string representing the ABI JSON.
        Throws:
        SerializeAbiError - A serialization error is thrown if there are any exceptions during the conversion process.
